div.p: Crown Point Central School is a school in Essex County, New York that serves grades Pre-K to Grade 12. The Superintendent is Ms. Shari Brannock, and the Principal is Ms. Tara Celotti.
2758 Main Street, Crown Point, NY 12928

div.div: Managed in partnership with Champlain Valley Educational Services.

The Crown Point Central School District remains closed until May 15, 2020. More information will be shared as updates are received.
Letter from Superintendent Shari Brannock on the School Closing of Crown Point Central School: Read Here
